title: Developer Tools -> Detecting leaked memory by pointing out disconnected nodes
body: I find the Memory debugging tool good, what I am missing is to be able to see disconnected nodes easily and what is keeping them alive.

comments.body: Hello, ewolfman. I believe this is already supported via the Memory tool you alluded to. You can see a 1, 2, 3 step image here: https://twitter.com/f12devtools/status/530795301775241216. Or were you specifically looking for a way to find detached nodes via the DOM Explorer?
